buttons.title: Hello! My name is Rammy and today I will read My Name from the House on Mango Street.
buttons.speech: Hello! My name is Rammy and today I will read My Name from the House on Mango Street.

buttons.title: In English my name means hope.
buttons.speech: In English my name means hope.

buttons.title: In Spanish it means too many letters.
buttons.speech: In Spanish it means too many letters.

buttons.title: It means sadness, it means waiting.
buttons.speech: It means sadness, it means waiting.

buttons.title: It is like the number nine.
buttons.speech: It is like the number nine.

buttons.title: It is the Mexican records my father plays on Sunday mornings when he is shaving, songs like sobbing.
buttons.speech: It is the Mexican records my father plays on Sunday mornings when he is shaving, songs like sobbing.

buttons.title: It was my great-grandmother's name and now it is mine.
buttons.speech: It was my great-grandmother's name and now it is mine.

buttons.title: She was a horse woman too, born like me in the Chinese year of the horse--which is supposed to be bad luck if you're born female
buttons.speech: She was a horse woman too, born like me in the Chinese year of the horse--which is supposed to be bad luck if you're born female

buttons.title: but I think this is a Chinese lie because the Chinese, like the Mexicans, don't like their women strong.
buttons.speech: but I think this is a Chinese lie because the Chinese, like the Mexicans, don't like their women strong.

buttons.title: I would've liked to have known her, a wild horse of a woman, so wild she wouldn't marry.
buttons.speech: I would've liked to have known her, a wild horse of a woman, so wild she wouldn't marry.

buttons.title: Until my great-grandfather threw a sack over her head and carried her off.
buttons.speech: Until my great-grandfather threw a sack over her head and carried her off.

buttons.title: Just like that, as if she were a fancy chandelier.
buttons.speech: Just like that, as if she were a fancy chandelier.

buttons.title: That's the way he did it.
buttons.speech: That's the way he did it.

buttons.title: And the story goes she never forgave him
buttons.speech: And the story goes she never forgave him
